title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Episode 2 â€“ Witness
description:
March 13, 2017 / As Freddie Gray's harrowing screams echoed across Sandtown-Winchester, his arrest was witnessed by neighbors. We look at their neglected accounts and the history of the community. 

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain and Uncanny Valleys.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
